h2_title: How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector
content: The Supreme Inspector will use two types of elemental attacks in this fight, which are thunder and fire. In the first third of the fight, it will mainly use thunder attacks, so you'll want to have plenty of Shock-Quelling Powder with you and equip any gear or curios that give you extra resistance to shock. Fire will be introduced in the second portion of the fight, so you'll also want Body-Cooling Powder, and the final part will be a combination of the two elements.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Supreme_Celestial_Inspector.md', within the main section titled 'Supreme Celestial Inspector', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
The Supreme Inspector will use two types of elemental attacks in this fight, which are thunder and fire. In the first third of the fight, it will mainly use thunder attacks, so you'll want to have plenty of Shock-Quelling Powder with you and equip any gear or curios that give you extra resistance to shock. Fire will be introduced in the second portion of the fight, so you'll also want Body-Cooling Powder, and the final part will be a combination of the two elements.
